trends: There has been one other sighting in Anadarko
There were no other sightings in Anadarko on or around July 13th 2012
Summary: Red /orange glowing ball moving Northeast slowly
divs: sighting detailson the night of july 13th approximately 11:30 at night my son saw an red\orange glowing ball moving northwest slowly making no sound. he watched it until it disappeared. the same night at approximately 4:30 in the early morning his brother saw a red orange glowing ball that moved north it didn't fade away, it disappeared suddenly.
